unit.creator: Philodemus || Ranocchia, Graziano et Vassallo, Christian
unit.title: De rhetorica || Col. 81 PHerc. 1004 || Literary Apparatus

dsl.content: Col. 81 1-5 * 5-8 cf. Hom. Od. μ 329-373 6 γ̣ε[λά]ϲαι Henry: π̣ε[λά]ϲαι Essler 7 Sudhaus 8 * 10-11 [τὸ] μὴ π̣[ειϲ]|θῆναι * 11 [ἄν] τ̣ιϲ * 11-12 κα[ὶ] | κ̣[α]κ̣όν (vel κ̣[α]λ̣όν) e.g. * 13 αἱρετὸν * 14 [κ]αθ’ ἓν *
